name: Manic Mental Dental Defender
description:
DOWNLOAD RECOMMENDED (due to the weirdness of HTML5)

HOTKEYS (sorry, couldn't make an options menu in time!)

- ALT + ENTER: toggle fullscreen

- 1: skip intro and tutorial

- 2: toggle screen flash effects (looks really bad without them)

- M: theoretically should mute music but I don't think it works with the music in the intro... oops :p

My junkyard: https://github.com/pINETH/Godot-Wild-Jam--35/

CREDITS

Hue shader - https://gist.github.com/McSpider/c8c693f1065fdb5ec44c64cb9fdac340

Egg cracking sound - https://freesound.org/people/JarredGibb/sounds/244877/

Explosion sound - https://freesound.org/people/FullMetalJedi/sounds/380448/

Click sound - https://freesound.org/people/bassoonrckr/sounds/329355/ Ear ringing sound - https://freesound.https://freesound.org/people/david_werecat/sounds/231655/org/people/david_werecat/sounds/231655/

Music was made by me during the jam! The 2 songs are also the first songs I ever finished!
